lead_paragraph: A series of confessions by foreign and local executives on China's state-controlled television has spurred anxiety among the business community about a trend that some lawyers say makes a mockery of due process.

headline.main: TV Confessions in China an Unsettling New Trend for Executives
headline.print_headline: TV Confessions in China an Unsettling New Trend for Executives

snippet: A series of confessions by foreign and local executives on China's state-controlled television has spurred anxiety among the business community about a trend that some lawyers say makes a mockery of due process....
